info.author: Marty Alchin
info.description: Most hyphenation libraries simply split the word up for you, without inserting hyphens. This just wraps one of those libraries and inserts HTML soft hyphens (`­`), suitable for use in justified text.
info.name: shyphenate
info.html_description: Most hyphenation libraries simply split the word up for you, without inserting hyphens. This just wraps one of those libraries and inserts HTML soft hyphens (­), suitable for use in justified text.
